excerpt: This vegetarian burger recipe is so flavourful and filling – and made entirely from scratch, from quinoa to burger!

instructions.name: Cook the quinoa
instructions: In a saucepan, combine quinoa and water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cover.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until quinoa is tender.
Remove from heat and fluff with a fork.

instructions.name: Make the black bean mixture
instructions: In a skillet, sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add black beans, cumin, smoked paprika, and salt.
Cook for 3-5 minutes, or until beans are heated through and beginning to brown.
Remove from heat and mash beans with a potato masher or fork.

instructions.name: Make the burgers
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, black bean mixture, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Use your hands to thoroughly mix the ingredients.
Form mixture into 4 patties, using wet hands to prevent sticking.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add patties and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until golden brown and crisp.
Remove patties from heat and allow to cool slightly.
To assemble burgers, spread mayo on bottom bun.
Add lettuce, tomato, red onion, and quinoa patty.
Top with other half of bun and serve immediately.
